Package kaitech.api.database

Interface PinTable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PinTblImpl
    public interface PinTable
    The PinTable interface declares required functionality to store, retrieve, and modify PINs in the database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String generateSalt​(int length)
      Generates a randomized String salt of given length.
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAllNames()

      Retrieves a pin from the cache.
      java.lang.String getSalt​(java.lang.String name)
      Gets the salt associated with the name.
      java.lang.String hashPin​(java.lang.CharSequence pin, java.lang.String salt)
      Hashes a given pin with the salt.
      void putPin​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String hashedPin, java.lang.String salt)
      Saves a given String name and String pin to the database.
      void removePin​(java.lang.String name)
      Removes the pin from the database.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllNames

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAllNames()
        Returns:
        A set of all String names of pins in the database.

      • getHashedPin

        java.lang.String getHashedPin​(java.lang.String name)
        Retrieves a pin from the cache. If the pin does not currently exist in the cache, query the database for the pin. If the query is successful, add the pin to the cache and return it.
        Parameters:
        name - The name associated with the pin to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        The char array pin if it exists, null if it does not or cannot be retrieved.

      • putPin

        void putPin​(java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String hashedPin,
            java.lang.String salt)
        Saves a given String name and String pin to the database.
        Parameters:
        name - The String name for the pin.
        hashedPin - The hashed and salted new String pin to be added.
        salt - The salt for the pin.

      • removePin

        void removePin​(java.lang.String name)
        Removes the pin from the database.
        Parameters:
        name - The String name of the pin to be deleted.

      • updatePin

        void updatePin​(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String newHashedPin)
        Updates the pin of the associated name with the new hashed pin value.
        Parameters:
        name - The String name of the pin to be changed.
        newHashedPin - The new String hashed pin for the associated name.

      • getSalt

        java.lang.String getSalt​(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the salt associated with the name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the pin to get the salt of.
        Returns:
        The String salt.

      • updateSalt

        void updateSalt​(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String newSalt)
        Updates the salt of the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the pin to update the salt of.
        newSalt - The new salt.

      • generateSalt

        java.lang.String generateSalt​(int length)
        Generates a randomized String salt of given length.
        Parameters:
        length - The length of the random salt to generate.
        Returns:
        A new random salt of given length.

      • hashPin

        java.lang.String hashPin​(java.lang.CharSequence pin,
                         java.lang.String salt)
        Hashes a given pin with the salt.
        Parameters:
        pin - The pin to hash.
        salt - The salt to hash the pin with.
        Returns:
        A salted pin.
